question: Which one of the following groups of animals belongs to the category of endangered species?
option1: Snow Leapord, Asian Black Bear, Himalayan Palm Civet, Western Hoolock Gibbon
option2: Snow Leapord, Olive Ridley Turtle, Gharial, Indian Rhinoceros
option3: Snow Leapord, Red panda, Western Hoolock Gibbon, Golden Langur
option4: Pygmy Hog, Red Panda, Golden Langur, Indian Star Tortoise
answer: Snow Leapord, Red panda, Western Hoolock Gibbon, Golden Langur
explanation:
Indian Star Tortise-Least concern
Olive Ridley Turtle- Vulnerable
Himalayan Palm Civet-least concern
Asian black bear-Vulnerable
Indian rhinoceros-vulnerable
